svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of urban vs. rural population using at least basic drinking water, 2015
Share of urban versus rural population using at least a basic drinking water source; that is, an improved source within
30 minutes’ round trip to collect water.
Source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP)
